main event: Several UFO sightings were reported in Pomona, California in 1955, including glowing orange lights in the sky and a round, glowing object moving slowly.
interesting points: One of the sightings reported two bright orange lights moving rapidly and then disappearing in the northern sky.
Another sighting described a white light turning yellow and gradually fading out over a 3-minute observation period.
The witness of the round, glowing object observed it for 5 minutes and described it as moving slowly.
An observer expressed concern about intentional prevention of information about UFO sightings from becoming public.
The Air Force investigator was unable to identify the lights observed by the witness, leading to the classification of the case as 'Unidentified' due to lack of sufficient information.
sighted object: growing orange lights, round glowing object
